c2d 0.0.9019
  • Reference
  • C2D Codebook

Get referendum data

Source: R/c2d-GEN.R
referendums.Rd

Downloads the referendum data from the C2D Database. See the codebook for a detailed description of all variables.

referendums(
  use_cache = TRUE,
  cache_lifespan = "1 week",
  incl_archive = FALSE,
  is_draft = FALSE,
  country_code = NULL,
  subnational_entity_name = NULL,
  municipality = NULL,
  level = NULL,
  type = NULL,
  date = NULL,
  date_time_created_min = NULL,
  date_time_created_max = NULL,
  query_filter = NULL,
  tidy = TRUE
)

Arguments

use_cache

Return cached results if possible. If FALSE, results are always newly fetched regardless of cache_lifespan.
cache_lifespan

The duration after which cached results are refreshed (i.e. newly fetched). A valid lubridate duration. Only relevant if use_cache = TRUE.
incl_archive

Whether or not to include an archive column containing data from an earlier, obsolete state of the C2D database.
is_draft

TRUE means to include only referendum entries with draft status, FALSE to include only normal entries. Set to NULL in order to include both draft and normal entries.
country_code

The country_code(s) to be included. A character vector.
subnational_entity_name

The subnational_entity_name(s) to be included. A character vector.
municipality

The municipality(s) to be included. A character vector.
level

The level(s) to be included. A character vector.
type

The type(s) to be included. A character vector.
date

The date(s) to be included. A character vector.
date_time_created_min

The minimum date_time_created to be included. A date, a datetime, or something coercible to (like "2006-01-02" or "2006-01-02T15:04:05").
date_time_created_max

The maximum date_time_created to be included. A date, a datetime, or something coercible to (like "2006-01-02" or "2006-01-02T15:04:05").
query_filter

A valid MongoDB JSON query filter document which allows for maximum control over what data is included. This takes precedence over all the other parameters, i.e. if query_filter is provided, the parameters country_code, subnational_entity_name, municipality, level, type, date, is_draft, date_time_created_min and date_time_created_max)`` are ignored.
tidy

Whether or not to tidy the referendum data, i.e. apply various data cleansing tasks and add additional variables. If FALSE, the raw MongoDB referendum data will only be modified just enough to be able to return it as a tibble. Note that the latter doesn't conform to the codebook (i.a. different variable names).

Value

A tibble.

See also

Other referendum data functions: add_referendums(), count_referendums(), download_file_attachment(), edit_referendums(), referendum(), search_referendums(), validate_referendums()

Examples

if (FALSE) {
# get all referendums (excl. drafts)
c2d::referendums()}

# get only referendums in Austria and Australia on subnational level
c2d::referendums(country_code = c("AT", "AU"),
                 level = "subnational")

#> # A tibble: 31 × 54
#>    id                       id_official id_sudd country_code country_name subnational_ent…

# provide custom `query_filter` for more complex queries like regex matches
# cf. https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/reference/operator/query/regex/
c2d::referendums(query_filter = '{"country_code":{"$regex":"A."}}')
